website_summaries.verdict: An excellent investment for rear-facing riders. Provides a good view of baby and earns rave reviews for clear image, stability, and easy installation.
pros: Glass is acrylic/shatterproof and the mirror anchors securely to headrest using double straps
Purchase includes access to an ebook about baby nutrition
cons: Mirror may not fit on all headrests
potential buyers should check for car compatibility first

customer_reviews.title: Need specific headrests in vehicle to attach safely
customer_reviews.text: The problem with it (aside from the first time mom jitters of having something that could possibly become dislodged and hit the baby in case of an accident - as warned by car seat experts, nurses giving baby classes, etc.) is that it requires headrests that go up and down with bars, like I have in the front seats, but not in the back, (2015 Jeep Patriot). When I was reading all of the reviews and notes about the product I didn't see that - could be my fault, just wanted other prospective buyers to be aware.
customer_reviews.author: JLChristine

customer_reviews.title: Large and stable!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a couple reviews that said that this mirror does not stay steady. I have no idea what happened with those mirrors, but this thing is steady as a rock even when going over major bumps. And it is also extremely clear in large for me to see my baby in the backseat!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Best. Mirror. EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a handful of other mirrors but wasn't at all satisfied by how well they worked. This mirror is beyond perfect. Great view, large mirror, the swivel back lets you get the PERFECT angle and it even fits on that awkward little headrest in the middle of the backseat. Love love love love love. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It's big and gives you a pretty good view of your rear-facing little one in their car seat. Happy that it shipped with a protective film on it, so the mirrored surface was perfect when I took that off and installed it. I wish there was a better way to fasten it to the seat and tighten the straps, buy they work well enough for what I need and they surely feel secure enough for me to not worry about it falling onto the bay or becoming a projectile. It's lightweight and easy to adjust. No compaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Great, small issues, would still recommend
customer_reviews.text: More wide angle than expected so son is super small in the view. Works well enough for quick peeks but not for seeing if he’s asleep or drooling/ lost his Binkie quickly unless parked or at a stop light/sign or passenger is able to look for you via rearcire mirror or visor mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwdwrd

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product, ended up buying a second one. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that the straps can be annoying to tighten in tighter vehicles. Easy to install In my navigator, easy access however in my Jaguar F pace it was frustrating trying to tighten the straps. If you tighten too much, leaves indents on leather. If too loose mirror moves. Overall I do enjoy the size of the mirror and clarity of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that it didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: Ours broke after about two years of use. It states lifetime satisfaction but when you go to write the company it bounces back that the email is now valid. A little leary of the quality just cause it could of easily fell on my toddler had they been in the side seat. Not sure if the company will respond here but no way to contact the company through amazon or their own website.
customer_reviews.author: SD, Cali

customer_reviews.title: Shakes like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning mine, unfortunately. No amount of tightening the straps made this mirror stop shaking constantly. It’s super annoying to look at, and I would think it might give a baby motion sickness. I honestly don’t understand all these positive reviews because it’s obvious the ball joint is just too loose (with no way to tighten it down once you have the mirror positioned). And my car is BRAND NEW and rides very smoothly. I’m now seeking out a mirror that straps directly to the headrest without the adjustable feature.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: BEST MIRROR EVER
customer_reviews.text: BEST CAR MIRROR FOR KIDS EVER!!! I wish I would’ve gotten this from day one. I spent two years with my first born fiddling with the stupid click and Velcro ones from target and baby stores. I thought having the light and music was great, but what’s not great is turning and the mirror falling off, or not being able to get the right angle on the kid without stuffing crap behind it. This mirror takes care of all those problems! It is so sturdy, I think I could take my minivan four wheeling and the thing wouldn’t move an inch. I now have two, one for each of my kiddos and I recommend it to EVERYONE with little ones.
customer_reviews.author: krystiana hansen

customer_reviews.title: Wide mirror...great for viewing your baby in the car seat
customer_reviews.text: The width of the mirror allows for a great view of the child in the rear-facing car seat and the straps remain fastened to keep the mirror stable. Easy to fasten to headrest.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Good baby mirror and GREAT Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome baby mirror and what makes it even better is their customer service. The day I received my mirror I received an email from its owner seeking feedback. We had initially installed this mirror in the middle seat and the straps were kind of short as this mirror is meant for side seats where the headrest can be detached. We have moved the car seat and the mirror to the corner and now the mirror works fine. It is wide and we can change the angles. It provides a great view of your child and gives you the peace of mind that the baby is doing fine.
customer_reviews.author: MK Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable mirror works, pricey compared to other options
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these last summer for my cars. I also recommended my friend do the same & she loves hers. They work really well, the adjustable swivel is amazing. My first daughter's mirror did not have a swivel and it was nearly impossible to adjust and see her. That being said I came back to order a 3 for our new car and they have doubled in price. It is a great product but I can't see spending $30 when there are very similar products for under $20. They lost my business due to this price hike.
customer_reviews.author: I am Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble finding a mirror that would work for our center mounted carseat, which doesn't have a headrest. This mirror has enough swivel that we could mount it on a side seat and turn it in. Now we can easily see the baby from both the driver and passenger seats! Super easy to install, and the mirror is large but crazy big. The only thing I don't love is you can't lock the position in place, so we tend to knock the mirror when putting the carseat back in the car and then have to readjust. Not a huge deal, but a lock would be nice. Like I said, other than that, I'm extremely happy with this mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son so he could see my granddaughter in the car as the baby car seat was facing towards the rear. That was always a concern. The mirror was large but gave a very good view. I like the double straps, vertical and horizontal, as they stopped it from slipping off and becoming a projectile in a accident. The baby likes seeing herself and her parents in the mirror and I believes calms her when in the backseat by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: we needed mirrors for our older vehicles which don't have a center headrest in the back. finding mirrors that would tilt and rotate seemed to be a difficult task, and I was skeptical about how this one would perform. fortunately, they work just perfectly! they installed in just a minute or so, and were easily adjusted. haven't had any issues with them coming loose or not holding their position, and we've used them for several long car rides already.
customer_reviews.author: norcal

customer_reviews.title: This mirror does a great job at reflecting
customer_reviews.text: This mirror does a great job at reflecting. Probably one of the most motivated mirrors I've used in a while, it really wants to outshine the competition. It buckles easily onto a headrest, and the swivel mount lets you adjust it so that you can easily see your baby, dog, cat, goat, chicken, or whatever you like to keep hidden in your backseat, with minimal adjustment of your rearview mirror. Don't have a kid or domesticated animal? Level it and you'll get a backseat view of the car and the road ahead of you, great for feeling like you're being chauffeured without leaving the front seat.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Clear and ajustable
customer_reviews.text: I just became a grandma and thrilled to take my grandson out with me, but I hated being alone in the car with him while he is facing the rear in the back seat and I can’t see him! I’m old school, and babies used to ride up front. Anyway, this mirror solved my problem. Now I can glance up into my rear view mirror and check on him. The mirror image is clear and baby’s mommy says that she loves the adjustability, The one that she bought for my son’s car can not be adjusted and she’s ready to run out and buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loved it for his new baby daughter
customer_reviews.text: When I asked my nephew's wife what they'd like as a gift for their new baby girl, she said a new car mirror as the one the'd purchased for their first child fell apart. When they opened this mirror they were thrilled and immediately began talking about how it was better than the previous mirror; larger size, it swivels to get the exact angle, the straps to insure it would stay in place. I don't have feedback from them yet which I know isn't' very helpful for a review however considering they have experience with baby car mirrors and were so thrilled with this one. I'm confident they will love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this mirror to new parents
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I bought a second mirror for my husband's car and recommended it to a friend. It reflects a large, clear image, but I still feel like I can see out the back window easily. I was initially hesitant to put a mirror in the car at all, but it feels secure, and I have less anxiety now that I can see her. I did notice it drooped a little over the four months I've been using it, but I just tilted it back up again and it's been fine since.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: F I N A L L Y !
customer_reviews.text: I have an almost 3 year old and a 1 year old and have already been through several bad mirrors. All have been difficult to install, adjust, stay in place, and poor visibility when they do "work". But then I tied these. WHERE HAVE THESE MIRRORS BEEN for the last 3 years?! Incredible! None of the above issues, and visibility is so great that I can even see my baby, who is now rear facing in the center seat, even though the mirror is mounted on the rear driver's side seat. I'm thrilled with this. Will be sending to friends with new babies!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: Goooood mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this Mirror. It is BIG and it is giving a very clear view of our baby facing backwards in the baby car seat. I have a very old car and my back carseat doesn't have the headrest. I am using it on the Middle seat hand-rest. This handrest can be pulled up and that is where I have hooked my mirror. After bending the mirror towards the baby, it is simply the best view for our baby. Now while driving, my wife can check what the baby is doing. I highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: A Tirk

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth the $30 I paid for it. I am a little embarrassed that I allowed these reviews to get the better of me... there are less expensive options that do the same thing. Feels like a cheap plastic toy that could easily break. It's unfortunate that I prematurely tossed the box. I would have definitely returned it and went for something 2/3 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ahavah

customer_reviews.title: Must have! Crystal clear!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the best. I was hesitant at first because it was more expensive than some of the other ones with similar reviews. I had a different one for my car and we needed a second for my husbands car. The minute he installed this one in his car, I was hooked. It is SO much better than the one from our local baby store. The mirror is huge and crystal clear. I could barely see my baby’s face with our last one, and I can see his top half of his body with this one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Best backseat mirror I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why all car backseat mirrors aren't made like this. The swivel adjustment is genius! My old backseat mirror was adjusted using the straps (and seems to be a common design among backseat mirrors) going around the headrest, and it never stayed put. I've only had to adjust the mirror once after my toddler climbed into the backseat and bumped the mirror en route. Also, the large size and slightly curved shape of the mirror are awesome. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cea

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best mirror on the market! I can see my little one so clear in this! And it’s super easy to install and you can move it to the perfect position! I highly recommend this! You won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy_of_Three

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I carefully reviewed most of the comments posted here on Amazon before purchasing ( BTW they customer who posted a pic of a blurred mirror and complained about the clarity of the mirror....That 's how my mirror arrived also. I peeled off the protective plastic off and whalah! ) The mirror is extremely stable as I tightened all the straps to avoid any shaking, and my baby just stares at me while we drive.. I love it and so does she.....4 month old baby!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LARGE mirror. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! My husband was suspect when I told him we NEEDED this, but now he loves it. First off, the mirror is very large, so I can easily see my lil' babe, which I love. Second off, I also really love how it buckles on the head rest. Much better than velcro. And that it has both horizontal & vertical buckles. So it really stays in place. Lastly, I love that the mirror itself swivels, so I can position it where I need. And we have a Jeep Rangler Unlimited, which is pretty bumpy, & it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: MHoisi

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mirror! I had to buy this mirror after it was misplaced when my car was totaled. I thought about getting the same one I had, but I couldn't ever quite get the last mirror to stay where I could see my son. This mirror allows me to see my son and he can also see me! I LOVE looking back at him at lights and exchanging smiles. The only thing that I would change is that I wish I had this mirror ALL ALONG. It easy to install, easy to get the perfect angle, and also entertains my son. So excited about this purchase and I would recommend it to any new mom... it worth EVERY PENNY.
customer_reviews.author: KSaxi

customer_reviews.title: BEST car mirror on the market
customer_reviews.text: I'm so super impressed with this mirror! I had another brand for the first three months after my baby was born and I always had issues adjusting it. Then I found this one, and plan on buying a second for my husband's car! Totally durable, and so much easier to adjust! It's also huge, I can really have a full view of my son in the backseat, and he seems happy and content to see himself (and me) as well. I really can't say enough great things! Wish I found this one from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: ang1278

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for this mirror
customer_reviews.text: My baby sometimes cries when we are driving and if it's just me and her, I have to see what's going on. So this was a life saver, but I wish they included the manual for installation, I didn't understand at first, how it was supposed to be attached to I unscrewed the flexible back handle and while trying to get it installed, dropped the screw and lost it, I had to go shopping for one of that size. Hopefully the rest of buyers are better with figuring it out
customer_reviews.author: Zarina A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Mirrors on the Market
customer_reviews.text: These are the third mirrors we tried and we LOVE them. We have twins and so it was difficult to find two mirrors that would allow us to place them at an angle to properly see both babies completely. These are large and have great mirror to them without any distortion. You can rotate them horizontally or vertically depending on your needs. They have two straps to secure to the headrest (a lot of other mirrors just have a single strap which doesn’t allow you to get a good position without sagging). We are extremely satisfied. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too big for a sonata
customer_reviews.text: This is a good mirror and i ordered it because of the awards price and other reviews....I had to return it! this mirror is for an SUV/ Mini-van/truck. the headrest in my back seat was just to small for it to stay put. I drive a hyundai sonata. Others leaving a review should mention which vehicle they drive
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: Can be really helpful but ill try to see other similar ones
customer_reviews.text: Dislike: 1. my baby's reflection seem rather small or seem far. Compared to one that is magnified and easy to look at, instead of squinting. 2. The strap to secure it around the car sit, doesn't have a rubber or some sort of padding that would protect my leather sita. Like:
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is really nice and reflects perfectly but my mirror shakes like crazy when I’m driving. I’ve tried readjustment but it still shakes. I don’t know if this is the way it’s supposed to be. If it is I would’ve bought a different mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent car seat mirror. Superior quality.
customer_reviews.text: The quality and clarity of this mirror is excellent. We also like the width and how we can easily see from the rear view mirror without stretching. This is our 3rd car seat mirror and first time buying this one - it’s leagues above the rest in terms of quality and functionality. Not even comparable. We will most likely replace our other mirrors with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror. Larger than most.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great baby mirror. I ordered this because my wife often drives the baby (14 month) by herself and the baby has started having depression anxiety. This mirror is larger than most and allows the baby to see my wife. My wife said that now the baby often waves and smiles at her on their drives. I’m very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Cannot see baby in mirror with factory tinted car windows
customer_reviews.text: If you have tinted windows, you may not be able to see baby at all in the mirror. Really wanted to like this mirror, but even after moving it around every possible direction in backseat, came to realize we cannot see baby at all using this mirror with our car’s tinted windows (factory tint). This was true even with the brightest of sunny days. Might work for those without any tint, but just a warning if you have tint on your car windows.
customer_reviews.author: LWags

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I had this baby backseat mirror before and ordered another one for my second child (I'd lost the first in the move, and my oldest child faces front now). My oldest loved making faces at the mirror, great entertainment. I enjoy looking back to see what's wrong with the baby if she's crying just in case I need to pull over. Even though it's not the most necessary purchase I've made for children, it's one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Darren M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: The large size is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backseat mirror. It’s really large so it allows you to see so much more than those tiny cutesy mirrors. I can almost see my entire toddler in it! Besides being so large, it’s extremely clear! My only issue is that I have to readjust it pretty often due to it accidentally getting touched or bumped. Readjusting a mirror is difficult when you can’t see what it will look like from the front seat. Overall, I highly recommend it! It may not be as cute as some you can get but it’s way more practical if you are using the mirror to see your baby rather than being cute for the baby to look at themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Your child won't feel alone in the back seat!
customer_reviews.text: The view is large enough that a child feels comfort being able to see more of the parent and can be entertained by the large viewing area. It only takes a very short time to become acclimated to the mirror. You'll be able to instinctively and immediately look at the child via your rear view and the Backseat Mirror to see it's face and body language to interpret if he or she is comfortable. It advances the safety of the child and 'just as important', the driver's ability to concentrate on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Alligator A & E

customer_reviews.title: After searching and searching....this was the best choice!
customer_reviews.text: I had literally read hundreds of reviews for carseat mirrors and could not understand why it was so difficult to find one that people liked. I mean, seems pretty straight forward...a mirror that you can view your child from the rear view mirror right? Well....after searching and searching, so happy I decided on this one! Search no more....this was so easy to install, it's just two buckles and some tightening of the straps, then positioning the mirror and you're good to go. I love how wide the mirror is, in comparison to others on the market this one is larger, but not in a bulky way. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deena Maharaj

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended if you have tinted windows
customer_reviews.text: The general purpose of this works, except if there’s no direct sunlight into your car or if your windows are tinted, it’s really not bright enough to see my daughter through my rear view mirror in this mirror. The plastic reflector used doesn’t work that great and now I’m stuck looking for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Danzer

customer_reviews.title: Our cutie loves staring at himself!
customer_reviews.text: This backseat mirror is the perfect size and quality. I was amazed at how clear the reflection is, I feel like other mirror as not as reflective? I don't know how to explain aside from everything looks HD... It does not obscure the vision of the rear view, yet it still big enough to see most of the back seat. The "pivot technology" also helps to adjust the mirror, allowing you to place the mirror on the side headrest if a middle headrest is not available. We feel safer being able to see our little one when we are out on the road. It is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sayed Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We held out getting a backseat mirror for a little, while and finally gave in when for our 2nd child when we upgraded her bucket car seat to a rear-facing convertible one. Can't believe we waited this long. At first I thought this mirror looked a little too big and would obstruct my overall view of rearview window when driving, but this is not the case at all. High quality mirror, easy to assemble. Just purchased another one for the other family car.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great and inexpensive product that does the same thing as more expensive name brand items
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is perfect for looking into the backseat and giving the driver full view of a baby in their car seat. It’s a large mirror with a great shape for a clear view but it also has a small enough profile to still effectively be able to use the rear view mirror as it was intended. Still not sure on the durability as I have not had this mirror for very long. But when the angle gets adjusted, it stays in that position very well.
customer_reviews.author: bryce higgins

customer_reviews.title: Big and installs easily!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is gigantic! I was not expecting that when I ordered it but it has worked out well and is a breeze to install. One thing to note: if you keep your LO in the center seat and your center headrest is small, it will not fit and you will need to put the mirror on one of the side headrests and angle it toward your car seat. Works fine though doing that and my LO loves looking into the mirror. However, no one can really sit in that side seat unless you remove the mirror (which is easy to do) because it would probably be uncomfortable to sit there with the mirror behind your head.
customer_reviews.author: CBP

customer_reviews.title: Works great to keep an eye on the little ones in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep an eye on the little ones in the rear facing car seats, but they definitely get in the way when trying to see your blind spots, just something to keep in mind. simple method of attaching to the head rests and nice ability to swivel to fit your viewing needs
customer_reviews.author: I like to try things

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra coin
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy because if the cost, but WOW do I wish we had this from the beginning. Used to have to legit readjust our old mirror 3+ times a trip. No exaggeration. I finally got fed up and am so glad I invested in this mirror. It's been over a month and we haven't had to readjust yet. View is HD. It's worth the extra coin, y'all.
customer_reviews.author: ACAW

customer_reviews.title: Puts me at ease
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this mirror. It puts our mind at ease when driving, because we are easily able to see our son in the rear facing car seat in the back. He can also see us, which helps calm him down when he gets cranky. It is very easy to install as it is just a couple of straps with clips that you can tighten to any headrest.
customer_reviews.author: Jeb Cariker

customer_reviews.title: View is very clear, sturdy pivot and easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: We have this mirror and an older one purchased from Britax a couple years back. So far we like this one better as the pivot is a bit stiffer making the mirror alignment stay better in place. I think the view is a little bit better than the Britax version as well. Only gave 4 stars for the material quality because it just "looks" like a cheaper product vs. Britax. However I will say that since the since the surround is a high-gloss black plastic, the finish will likely outlast that of the Britax which the material in the surround had begun to yellow about 1.5 years in..
customer_reviews.author: Momlife

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, easily secured and adjusted.
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror! I tried two other mirrors before I got this one. The others where not stable and couldn't be angled to get a good view of baby. I have a Honda Accord and baby's car seat is in the middle of the back seat. This mirror was easy to secure so it doesn't wobble or bounce on the head rest of the nearby seat. It is also adjustable to give the right angle to be able to fully see baby. It is a big mirror so the driver can look and easily see baby. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because of the great reviews and I’m glad I did! Very easy to install, and the mirrors barely move at all. My cars headrest doesn’t not adjust so I was worried I would have to return, but I was able to fit right over it and it’s sturdy and works great
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Super clear view
customer_reviews.text: We have another brand for the other car that we bought a Target - this one is far better. The reason I got it is because the headrest in my car is quite small, and I tried some other ones that just were too large to work with my car... this one has a smaller mounting point/strappy thing, but it turns out that it is super clear and doesn't vibrate like the one we got at target. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TommyBoy

customer_reviews.title: I love the mirror I just wish they would come up ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the mirror I just wish they would come up with a better way of attaching to a seat without a head rest and be able to tilt it in more different directions. Overall a good product just didn't work will great for my vehicle cause I have a Yukon and they baby rides in the middle of the middle seats and there is no headrest.
customer_reviews.author: GrannyS.

customer_reviews.title: Easily installed in the rear center of a Prius.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with straps. When we did a carseat check, the highway patrol officer said they don't like these mirrors because they can become projectiles in a crash. Take your pick: potential hazard in a crash, or keep an eye on your baby to make sure they're OK while you drive.
customer_reviews.author: Saintly

customer_reviews.title: The best baby mirror ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd type of baby mirror we've tried for the back seat, and I sincerely wish we had known about this one sooner. It is super easy to install, stays in place, and works tremendously well. Be sure that you PAY ATTN TO THE HEAD REST REQS listed by the seller, and you'll be super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Mama for Grace

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror because it was the biggest one that I found when doing a quick search on AMZ. Installation was super easy! I did it in about 2 minutes without reading the instructions because it's so intuitive. There are no problems with it shaking or moving around. In order to ensure this, though, you have to make sure that the straps are tightened well so that it can't move. I can see my baby very easily and I noticed her entertaining herself with it immediately after installation. I am VERY happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney W.

customer_reviews.title: So good we bought three of them!
customer_reviews.text: So good we bought three of them! Both cars have one and one is for the aunt/uncle/grandparents to put in their car while driving. We initially bought a cheaper model but it didn't stay where you wanted it, constantly it had to be adjusted and we were thinking about not using one at all. Well, problem solved. This one adjusts and you can angle it pretty much any way you want. If your headrest is too curved (we encountered one of those so far) you can put a towel underneath and it will work fine. Full five stars, only wish they'd be a bit cheaper ;-)
customer_reviews.author: hexe983

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a mirror to work!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a search for a car mirror that would work for my back seat. The head rest on my car is attached, so no mirrors worked. After going through 4 different ones... this mirror not only worked, but I love how big the mirror is (not too big, just right) and my favorite part is that you can move it any which way you want to get it to work for you. You can see your baby at any angle. I can even see her when I am setting in the passenger seat! I am so glad I found this mirror! Hands down the best! Do look any further!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Better than my last one
customer_reviews.text: I like this mirror a lot better than my last. The swivel is awesome. I never find it super easy to install these mirrors because it’s hard to see the back of the headrest. But at least there’s a swivel on the mirror so I can make up for any crookedness from securing the mirror to the headrest
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!
customer_reviews.text: Worthless!! The straps don’t cinch, literally falls off the headrest daily, not even functional. Finally got so frustrated that I tried to take if off and the buckles are stuck! Will prob have to cut the whole thing off. Don’t buy! Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must have!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a bit surprised by the grand size of this mirror. Once installed, however, I saw the advantage. It actually looks very nice once in place (I have an Odyssey, for seat size reference). I love that not only can I view my baby in this mirror, but also her immediate surroundings around her car seat.
customer_reviews.author: BArnold

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use while driving
customer_reviews.text: This mirror allows me to easily see our son from the rearview mirror while driving and for him to see us. It's reassuring to look back quickly at a red light and make sure he's happy and healthy. We have one in my vehicle and my husband's.
customer_reviews.author: TXKateNVA

customer_reviews.title: Great, but gets scratched up easily...
customer_reviews.text: They seem to move pretty easy, which is both nice and annoying. Unfortunately they scratch easy too. Not sure how it happened but one out of the two that I purchased got a huge scrape across it. Now it just bothers me every time I see it =/.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: EASY installation! PERFECT design, which helps to hold the mirror in place. My daughter enjoys looking at herself and I have the comfort of CLEARLY seeing what she is up to. This is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Gwaltney

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror! It stays in place while driving and I love how it’s large so I can see everything. It fits nicely in my small car and in my SUV. I would highly recommend this product. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: cbugai

customer_reviews.title: Very stable!
customer_reviews.text: I was originally gifted a Jeep mirror since I drive a Jeep Wrangler. You’d Think it would be stable especially for the type of vehicle it promotes but it was horrible. Within a few minutes of being on the road it moved so much I couldn’t see my baby anymore so it was basically useless. So I purchased this one and it has been perfect! I haven’t had the need to adjust it from moving on its own from the bumpy ride. Size is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Pita

customer_reviews.title: Only as good as your baby is cute
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it claims to be. My wife and I each have one in our respective cars, and it's been no nonsense since the day we installed them. I can't remember what we paid for these, but if they're cheap--no worries. This is probably what you're looking for. If they're expensive, well, at least they're actually good! ;) I should note that our baby is FREAKING ADORABLE, though, so maybe that affects my sense of the image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C. Barros-WingTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: The best mirror for parents & baby
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other car mirrors in stores, this one gives you a wide and clear view of your baby. I’m aware of what she’s doing and that gives me a peace of mind while I’m on the road. It’s not blurry and at times she can even see me while I drive and she also entertains herself. Make sure your car has a head rest that is compatible with the straps. Doesn’t take more than 5 min to install.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great to view baby and daytime
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it and we can see who easily through the rearview mirror. Product came exactly as advertised however in hindsight I think I would have looked for something that will allow me to see him in the dark when we are driving at night. Maybe something that had a light on it o however in hindsight I think I would have looked for something that will allow me to see him in the dark when we are driving at night. Maybe something that had a light on it.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Whole Baby View
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is large and slightly convex, so you can see the whole baby and surrounding area, and she can see the driver. It fastened to the rear headrest in a snap. The reflection is clear and not distorted. Seems like a high-quality item that will last. My son and his wife had this on their registry and liked it so well, I bought one for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Safe. Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and install. Baby loves making faces and talking to himself in mirror. Now can see me driving (12 months old) and knows he’s not alone. A quick glance lets me see what he’s chewing on, if he spit up (again), and if he fell asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Erica A

customer_reviews.title: better than two others tried.
customer_reviews.text: This my third baby view mirror. Much better than my first one, which broke after a few months due to weak plastic and a dumb design. In retrospect, this one is much safer as the mirror comes fully attached to base, which is much more secure than something you assemble yourself. Another one we tried looks like a funhouse mirror. This mirror has a clear image and a wide view. I have used it for a month and do not see any fraying of the straps. Attaches securely to my headrest.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: I see you.
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. It's perfect size and fits great on my seat. My friend saw it today and commented, "oh, this is a good mirror. Most of them are filmy and hard to see through. This one is so clear." I agree.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann Stiglich

customer_reviews.title: Great field of view and positioning, terrible buckles!
customer_reviews.text: Completely awesome for about 30 days, until the clips decided they would no longer hold placement and the straps just slide out. We had to finally knot everything to get it to stay in place which is ridiculous for a mirror of this cost!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Best backseat mirror- only one you need
customer_reviews.text: This is the best backseat mirror. Others may be fun for your baby/toddler but if you really want to be able to see your baby, this mirror is the best. You can adjust it to any headrest. It tilts up,down, left,right. Very clear and big. I drive a minivan and I adjusted the mirror so I can see it from my rearview mirror. I can also turn my head and see my baby. And my baby can see me!
customer_reviews.author: J.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: The best backseat mirror on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the backseat mirror I'd been looking for over three years. We'd had one of the major brand ones, and we could never get it adjusted correctly. I had to reposition that one almost every time I drove. I saw this one reviewed positively on a car seat safety blog, and it seemed worth a try. It installed in about 15 seconds, and it has stayed in place for weeks. When my toddler knocks it out of place trying to hug her little brother after I strap him in, it's a cinch to turn it back. I wish I'd had this for my first child!
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Got My Eye On You
customer_reviews.text: Mom of four with surprise twins well after we thought we were done! This means I had nothing baby leftover nor did I want to repurchase everything. After we had a baby that kept choking on it's spit up, I needed to be able to view them easier in the car. Always hated mirrors because you never really could see the baby from the driver seat so was hesitant to buy this but loved it so much we bought two! CLEAR vision of babies on a BIG mirror, totally adjustable (and easily) yet mounts sturdy to the head rest. Also easy to take out and put in my husbands car if need be. BEST mirror option out there!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the mirror that you want. The mirrored surface is clear, not flexible and scratch-prone like other popular products, leaving you with an unclear view in a few months. The swivel base makes stop-light adjustments possible-again something the competitors can't do AT ALL. The convex shape gives a great view of the entire seat and more. There is no reason to get any other mirror on the market that I've seen. You don't need a light, trust me it won't work well anyway. If you need to check on your little one in the dark, flip on your overhead lights briefly and take a peak. Put this on your registry!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Anne Haha

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is huge and clear. I wanted a good mirror that met it's purpose. I hate little frilly mirrors with decorations. I've had this mirror since 2015 when my first child was born. As soon as my 2nd child was born I bought a 2nd one. It has 2 adjustable straps so although it's bigger than my headrest, the straps keep it attached. For reference, I have a 2013 mazda cx5.
customer_reviews.author: LavenderLass

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third carseat mirror- one for two of our cars and this one to replace one that was left in a rental car. This is by far the best of the three! It is exactly what is promised- the viewing area is awesome! Very clear image and you don't need to crank the mirror around to get the right angle. It was very easy to install into my middle seat adjustable headrest, which is small. It is a very clean image- no fogging or films. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: debimustard

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror. Worth the extra bucks
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror so much. It is a real mirror and not like the other ones that feel more plasticky and don't give a good reflection. And I love how wideband big it is. Definitely my favorite mirror.
customer_reviews.author: aBudy

customer_reviews.title: Clear image and easy install! Exactly what a busy parent is looking for
customer_reviews.text: We have a different brand for one of our kids and this mirror is MUCH better It is larger, the reflection is much clearer and it was the easiest install possible. It is shipped as one solid part that you just clip onto the headrest. The swivel is easy to maneuver but stiff enough to not wobble around when driving on bumpy roads. Wish we had purchased this mirror from the start!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable...
customer_reviews.text: One of the straps broke after a year... it’s strange... it’s been in the same car this whole time. It had become loose so I went to tighten the strap and it just snapped...
customer_reviews.author: Binglee

customer_reviews.title: Good service, good product. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this product. I originally bought it for the baby grandson, but my 2 year old granddaughter liked it so much I put it by her car seat and bought this one for the baby. It keeps them entertained in the car. For the back facing car seat, the mirror allows me to keep track of the baby because I can see it in the rear view mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great view of baby!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this mirror, easy to install and gives me a great view of grandbaby in back seat. She sits in a tall rear-facing carseat; I had no way of seeing her while I drove, couldn't tell if everything was ok-- very nerve wracking! Now I can see her and she can see herself :) This is a must-have!
customer_reviews.author: Michel1030

customer_reviews.title: Have two! Easily adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these mirrors. Bought one for our second baby and our toddler insisted he have one too! I love that it’s easily adjustable—however, my only complaint is that my son can move it all around with his feet because of his long legs! So he ends up turning it away from where I can see him. But hey, that’s toddlers. Great product. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Get this one,  seriously!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a second baby mirror and came around this one. It's amazing how clear the reflection is, it's big and very secure with four perpendicular straps. It doesn't move unless my toddler plays it. I love that I can put the mirror on the chair opposite the carseat and angle it just right so I'm not blocking the whole back window. After driving in my car and seeing the difference my husband asked me to replace all of our mirrors with this one. I tried ordering one from another company that looks similar but it's smaller and the clips are parallel.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our low quality seat mirror with the So Peep Baby Backseat Mirror. What a contrast! The previous mirror distorted images and had begun to develop a bleary patina (sun damage? ). The So Peep mirror is brilliantly clear and reflects without distortion. It took less than 2 minutes to set up and can be adjusted/angled for perfect visibility. We went cheap with the first mirror thinking a mirror is a mirror. Wrong! The whole point of getting a backseat mirror is to let baby and adult see each other. Spending a little more to see each other perfectly is a good move.
customer_reviews.author: Andy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t have been more happy with this purchase. Was looking for mirror to keep an eye on my little one while driving. This mirror is adequately sized so that you view the child as well as it does not block your rear view.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Chaudhary

customer_reviews.title: It’s a mirror
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter to use in car (obviously) for her newborn just before the pandemic began. Hasn’t really been out and about much but I haven’t heard any complaints yet so I guess it works.
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: mirror is excellent. my husband took it and put it in ...
customer_reviews.text: mirror is excellent. my husband took it and put it in his car it's so great. you can see the baby so well in this mirror compared to most other car mirrors and it was very easy to install and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Tuns

customer_reviews.title: best rear face mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 for my twins and I love them! The mirror is a great size, clear, durable and simple. For my first kid I got a fancy mirror with light and music and it was garbage! This is a great buy! I will buy it again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Angie F.

customer_reviews.title: Can't see babies face
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product of it's kind i've ever tried and I think this is a so-so product. While you can see babies bodies from the front seat and looking at the mirror, I can't see my babies face. I can't see whether he's breathing, eyes open or closed, basically, you can only see that your baby is in the car seat. As a first time mother, these things are important, i worry about SIDS all the time and get paranoid. I guess i rather have this product as opposed to not, but it's not particularly helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirrors we had for our first two kids had terrible glass (so our kids were never clearly visible in the mirror), they were fixed to the headrest so the angle was always wrong and if was hard to see them, and because it was fixed, it shook over bumps, etc. This mirror is very clear, doesn't shake, and it pivots so we can point it in exactly the right direction. This is my first product review. I wrote it because I got a very nice email from the company asking me how I like the mirror. I decided this was the most helpful way to tell them :-)
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Herlihy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really recommend this mirror. We had previously purchased a different one that didn’t have the pivot option and we couldn’t see our baby through the mirror. This works great being able to tip up, down or to the side to be able to see perfectly through our rear view mirror
customer_reviews.author: DBJII

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! I bought a different one when my baby was born. It flopped around and never was in the right position. I wish I had this mirror all along. It stays in place. Safely attaches to the headrest. I have it on the middle headrest. It is clear and easy to see my baby. Great mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Get one for each car.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my new grandson and his parents. They love it but need another one because they have two cars. I will get another one for them, they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Lake

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for when I have my granddaughter in the car and wish they had these when my son was small. It is a great product. My son and daughter-in-law have one and my granddaughter is used to be able to see her parents when she is in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: What a great product I love that this one adjusts up and ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give six stars I would. What a great product I love that this one adjusts up and down and side to side. The mirror is such a clear crisp image. I previously had a mirror that appeared as if it was all scratched up but it wasn’t that was just the way it came. I’m extremely happy with my purchase I highly recommend it!
